column2: "Good work, everyone. It's always fun when you go on a quest with four people."
"Plus, I took lots of screenshots of us looking cool with our weapons! I'll put them online later."
"Ooh, good thinking. Be sure to use a hashtag like #pusonifriends so we can find them."

"Send them to me, too.
...Wait, you think of me as a friend?"
"Where's this coming from? We play together so much, of course we're friends."
"Sorry to always be asking you for things when we've only just met. I hope we'll get on well in the future!"
"It's always so much fun. Thanks for coming out with us!"
"That Lobby Action was pretty cool, but how about this one..."
"I've uploaded the screenshots and tagged them with #pusonifriends!"
